name: get_misinformation_score_account_twitter_account_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mescalc.
Tool description: Calculates Misinformation Exposure Score for Twitter accounts
API description: Retrieves the misinformation score for a given Twitter account using the Mescal API.

twitter_account.description: The Twitter account ID for which to retrieve the misinformation score.
